features: 【Broader Compatibility】The USB headset with built-in upgraded smart chip that offers broad compatibility with most PC, Laptop, computer devices. Simply plug the wired computer headset into the USB port of computer device without any drivers and setup. Perfect match with Windows 7/8/8.1/10/11/XP/Mac OS X/Linux and higher laptops/desktops/Windows Surface 3 Pro/Google Chromebook/Raspberry Pi/PS4/PS5

【Upgraded Magnetic Wired PC Headphone】USB earbuds with built-in micriphone and extended 2.3 meters ultra long cable to ensure convenience and best experience in any occasions, such at work, at school, at home, for gaming, sturdying, live broadcasting, conferencing, etc. Magentic design allow you to tag the earbuds together and resting them around your neck. When you need to use the USB headset, you can easily put them on at any time

【Lightweight & Comfortable Wearing】Unlike most bulky headsets, this half in-ear usb headphones with microphone provides a comfortable and burden-free wearing experience for your ears. Ultra-lightweight earbuds, wrapped in skin-friendly material for a snug fit in the human ear, ergonomically designed to ensure comfortable all-day wear. Put crystal-clear sound in your ears and don't feel tired of living with music all day long

【Volume Control & Mute Function】Allow play/pause music, adjust volume get the ideal sound experience.You can press the middle button of the in-line controls to mute the microphone and release to resume your voice, the mute button makes conversation easier, more private and convenient. Warm tip: Hold the microphone close to your mouth for the best calling experience. Comes with a small clip to fix wire to avoid swinging and a portable case for easy storage and carrying on the go

【Noise-cancelling microphone】By reducing background noise, this USB headset with microphone provides extremely clear communication. The innovative design of the earbuds optimizes the noise canceling function of the headset, ideal for your ears, eliminating surrounding noise and providing the best listening experience. Ideal for home/office/live gaming/webinar sessions/business travel/online courses/entertainment/travel, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HGCXING CLEAR CHAT USB HEADSET Built in microphone picks up your voice loud & clear.It provides high quality communication and is durable and stable over a long period of time. Its excellent sound quality gives users nice experience.Innovative design provides a perfect fit for your ears, thus achieving excellent sound and noise isolation. Let you stay away from the noise, enjoy your time.USB headset for laptop adopts an ergonomic design, and it feels comfortable even when used for a long time.It is equipped with a 7.5 FT（2.3 meters）long USB cable which allows for a lot of freedom of movement. No drivers required. Warm Tips: 1. Please place the microphone closest to your mouth for optimum conversation effect. (Mute function: When you need to mute, please keep pressing the button, and then release it when you don’t need to mute.) 2. Please promptly clean up the dust impurities on the computer USB interface to avoid poor contact caused by the headset connected to the computer. 3. After plugging in the headset, please do not immediately put on the headset, wait a few minutes, and then use the headset after the static electricity imported by the computer into the headset is discharged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good option for parent

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice earbuds - impressive
reviews.reviewText: Great sound quality, both the earbuds and the microphone. Used for Zoom calls and I can be heard very clearly every time. The listing shows them as noise cancelling, not really though, they are just regular headphones/earbuds.I have a problem getting them to fit well in my ears, but I normally have this issue with other brands as well. The other brands tend to have different size cushion pieces to make them fit better but these do not.HUGE cord - this makes it very easy to move around instead of being tied directly in front of the computer or worrying about accidentally pulling the laptop off the desk if I forget and move away.The case is compact - very compact. It can be tough to get the cord wrapped up enough to push it all in the case, but it does fit. I just choose to not spend that much time and slide it in one of the laptop bag pouches instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and gets the job done!
reviews.reviewText: I liked that this set came with a very compact carrying case. However, the case was so compact that it does require you to actually really wind up the wire to make sure you can zip it up. I used this while I was traveling for work and wanted to take calls from the team room without needing everyone else to listen in on the call. My only other earphones were lightning cable earphones that could only be plugged into my phone (which couldn't be charged at the same time). This allowed me to listen to my calls, and music, without disturbing my teammates and charge my phone at the same time. The sound quality is basic, nothing super great to write home about, but perfectly adequate given the price. I didn't get any complaints about my microphone quality either so that was a win!The ability for the earbuds to stick to one another (magnetized) was a nice touch as I was able to put it down and not worry about the earbuds rolling all over the place. At one point, i even had it around my neck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars No bass! Poor frequency response.
reviews.reviewText: I really was looking forward to these USB magnetic earbuds with mic and controls. I prefer the USB-A interface to the 3.5" plugs as my computers use two versions requiring two pairs of headphones or an adapter. (1:2)When it arrived, it has a stylish and functional semi-hard storage case. The earbuds were neatly coiled and stayed attached thanks to the magnets. It does cut down on cable clutter and tangles.I tried it on my first system, a Windows 7 laptop and the earbuds were recognized and appropriate USB headphones driver was loaded.I tested the earbuds with Youtube video watching, and then played some familiar songs as well.The volume is sufficiently loud, and human speech was fine. But when listening to music. The sound quality and accuracy are poor and unacceptable. The frequency response had the upper highs and bass lows completely cut off. There was no bass at all. I tried to use a graphic equalizer to boost bass, and nothing happened. It was like listening to music on an old AM portable radio! I'm sure most were too young to know what I'm writing about! :)These earbuds are a disappointment. Their mediocre sound quality means they are only useful for privacy during VoIP or video meetings. The cable is more than long enough, and the built-in volume controls functioned as expected. But I can't recommend these if you enjoy listening to music as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little earbuds, big sound!
reviews.reviewText: These earbuds have amazing volume, they easily match the volume range of larger headphones. They have a really nice, crisp sound, too. I'd definitely recommend them for travel, or even everyday use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These are great earbuds!
reviews.reviewText: These are really great. The clarity is amazing when listing to music as well as being on a video call. The microphone works really well. I like that there is a clip and the volume is easy to increase or decrease. I really like these earbuds, they are marketed as head phones but they are earbuds. They are very comfortable and light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got these because my headphone outlet went out on my laptop and I really needed to be able to join calls in teams on my laptop. This allowed me to plug it into my USB port instead of the headphone outlet, and still have my ear piece type headphones!The sound is good and the microphone works good and is super clear!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Okey sound quality
reviews.reviewText: For the price you get what you pay for you. The base isn't to bad but it could be better. The overall volume is good. Just a good pair of headphones.
